thread.title: Hide Your Girl Because Salt Bae Is Back And He Brought Burgers
thread.title_full: Hide Your Girl Because Salt Bae Is Back And He Brought Burgers

author: Joel Balsam
title: Hide Your Girl Because Salt Bae Is Back And He Brought Burgers
text:
Salt Bae Made A Kobe Beef Cheeseburger, Enough Said © nusr_et / Instagram Salt Bae Made A Kobe Beef Cheeseburger, Enough Said Trending News: Hide Your Girl Because Salt Bae Is Back And He Brought Burgers Shares Quick Take 
There's something about Salt Bae that just makes you smile every time. It's not simply his famous salting technique — I mean, that's incredible — it's everything about him. The way he manhandles the meat, his finesse, the stare through his tiny round glasses... Please, ladies, keep your pants on. 
In his latest video, Salt Bae is at his best, salting the f*ck out of Kobe beef and turning it into probably the most delicious cheeseburger you've laid eyes on. 
Behold! A post shared by Nusr_et#Saltbae (@nusr_et) on Mar 22, 2017 at 6:30am PDT 
Watch how he slices the meat like it's butter. Watch him tap it into the meat grinder with his trademark finesse. Gawk as he slams the ground Kobe beef on the table and before you know it, he's salting. Oh, is he salting. Salting like only Salt Bae can. When the meat is good and salty, he gives it a slap that'll make your girlfriend jump out of her seat. Ladies, what did I say about those pants!? 
This isn't the first time Salt Bae has been wonderous in recent weeks. Check out some of his other incredible meat feats. A post shared by Nusr_et#Saltbae (@nusr_et) on Mar 12, 2017 at 7:13am PDT A post shared by Nusr_et#Saltbae (@nusr_et) on Feb 27, 2017 at 6:13am PST A post shared by Nusr_et#Saltbae (@nusr_et) on Mar 2, 2017 at 4:00am PST 
#saltlife Drop This Fact 
A recent study found that low-salt diets are bad for you , so keep up with the saltiness ladies and gentlemen. Show comments
